Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will meet your needs and expectations. We are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $1200000. This offer is designed to provide you with the best possible value while ensuring we receive a fair return for our investment. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information to make your decision. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
